casebody.data:
Bryan PUNTURO, Fawn Punturo, and B & A Holdings, LLC, Doing Business as Parkshore Resort, LLC, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
Brace KERN, Defendant-Appellant,
and
Saburi Boyer and Danielle Kort, Formerly Known as Danielle Boyer, Defendants. SC: 158749
COA: 338727 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 5, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiffs-appellees to extend the time for filing their answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before January 21, 2019.
